name: 2930 Creative
description:
TwentyNine Thirty is a digital creative agency specializing in graphic design, digital strategy, web development and branding. We go beyond social media and web development to create a holistic creative strategy that will get your company noticed. We believe that the work you create and the relationships you build are more important than the money you make or the size of the project.
No one part of a campaign is more important than the rest, and it's our job to provide our clients with the most holistic and effective strategy possible. 
The good you put out in the world comes back ten fold in opportunity and kindness. We believe in working hard, loving hard, creating things, and being kind to those around us. We position ourselves as an extension of our clients marketing departments, and not as an agency. 
 
READ MORE...
